name: Roll A Ball 3D (Mikel Román)
description:
·This is a game i made for a school project back in December 2020, our objective was to do the Roll A Ball tutorial of Unity  (https://learn.unity.com/project/roll-a-ball). When i completed the tutorial, i decided to expand the game adding new levels and different physics based mechanics!

·The game lacks of many things like game saving, checkpoints and diying will restart the game to the beginning due my limited technical knowledge at the time. The languague of the game is Basque and the difficulty is a bit unfair/tedious sometimes.

·The game consists on some gems that are located strategically on each level and each one has a unique ability on the gamplay!

-Morganite: Allows you to jump!

-Amethyst: Allows you to pass over solid objects.

-Sapphire: Gives you the ability to swim.

-Emerald: You shrink and bounce more!

-Citrine quartz: You gain electric power!

-Topaz: Use this gem as a key.

-Ruby: You gain destructive power!

·Hope you enjoy it!
